ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Universidad Técnica Particular de Loja for financial support for this study through of project PROY_QUI_0010. The authors thank also to Ministerio del Ambiente-Ecuador, for plant collection and research permissions (Autorización de Investigación Científica N° 001-IC-FLO-DBAP-VS-DRLZCH-MA). Special acknowledgments to members of the Shuar community “El Kiim”, especially its president Washington Tiwi.
